{"id":487200836,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1619820707,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/487200836/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int sm = accumulate(nums.begin(), nums.end(), 0);\n        int left = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i) {\n            if (left == (sm - left - nums[i])) return i;\n            left += nums[i];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
